p: In the present study, the wadi channels habitat had the highest values of most of the shoot parameters, i.e., vegetative height, canopy diameter, number of secondary ramifications, leaf area, leaf dry mass. On the other hand, the population of the abandoned fields habitat attained the highest values of all measured root and reproductive traits ( Table 1). These data reflect fast growth and plasticity toward stressful conditions [ 23]. Beyond the resource availability, it is worth mentioning here that the high content of water characterizes the soil of the wadi channels habitat [ 55]. The water content could be an important factor for the vegetative flourishing of A. ochroleuca in this habitat.
